lemma (in Ring) coprime_prod_int2Tr: "((\<forall>k \<le> (Suc n). ideal R (J k)) \<and> (\<forall>i \<le> (Suc n). \<forall>j \<le> (Suc n). (i \<noteq>j \<longrightarrow> coprime_ideals R (J i) (J j)))) \<longrightarrow> (\<Inter> {I. \<exists>k \<le> (Suc n). I = (J k)} = ideal_n_prod R (Suc n) J)"
